post.author: Soulburned
post.body:
Does this list only cover publisher/developers involved in making games or what about middleware companies like AmbX ( http://www.ambx.com/ )and game engine companies like Garage Games which provides Torque engine:
http://www.garagegames.com/

Wikipedia also has a nice list of game engines:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_game_engines

Oh and here's a couple of others to add to the list,
Nexxon - http://www.nexon.net (provides several MMO games: Maplestory, Mabinogi, Audition, Combat Arms, Sugar Rush, etc...)
Stardock Games - http://www.stardock.com/ (Sins of a Solar Empire, Political Machine, Galactic Civilizations II, etc...)
Irrational Games - http://www.irrationalgames.com/ (Tribes: Vengeance, System Shock II, Freedom Force, Thief, Ultima Underworld, etc...)
Arkane Studios - http://www.arkane-studios.com/en/index.php (Dark Messiah of Might & Magic, The Crossing, Arx Fatalis, etc...)
Troika Games - http://www.terra-arcanum.com/ (Vampire: Bloodlines, Temple of Elemental Evil, Arcanum, etc...)
Petroglyph - http://www.petroglyphgames.com/ (Universe At War: Earth Assault, Star Wars: Empire At War and expansions)

post.author: Soulburned
post.body:
Does this list only cover publisher/developers involved in making games or what about middleware companies like AmbX ( http://www.ambx.com/ )and game engine companies like Garage Games which provides Torque engine:
http://www.garagegames.com/

Wikipedia also has a nice list of game engines:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_game_engines

Oh and here's a couple of others to add to the list,
Nexxon - http://www.nexon.net (provides several MMO games: Maplestory, Mabinogi, Audition, Combat Arms, Sugar Rush, etc...)
Stardock Games - http://www.stardock.com/ (Sins of a Solar Empire, Political Machine, Galactic Civilizations II, etc...)
Irrational Games - http://www.irrationalgames.com/ (Tribes: Vengeance, System Shock II, Freedom Force, Thief, Ultima Underworld, etc...)
Arkane Studios - http://www.arkane-studios.com/en/index.php (Dark Messiah of Might & Magic, The Crossing, Arx Fatalis, etc...)
Troika Games - http://www.terra-arcanum.com/ (Vampire: Bloodlines, Temple of Elemental Evil, Arcanum, etc...)
Petroglyph - http://www.petroglyphgames.com/ (Universe At War: Earth Assault, Star Wars: Empire At War and expansions)

post.author: Soulburned
post.body:
Does this list only cover publisher/developers involved in making games or what about middleware companies like AmbX ( http://www.ambx.com/ )and game engine companies like Garage Games which provides Torque engine:
http://www.garagegames.com/

Wikipedia also has a nice list of game engines:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_game_engines

Oh and here's a couple of others to add to the list,
Nexxon - http://www.nexon.net (provides several MMO games: Maplestory, Mabinogi, Audition, Combat Arms, Sugar Rush, etc...)
Stardock Games - http://www.stardock.com/ (Sins of a Solar Empire, Political Machine, Galactic Civilizations II, etc...)
Irrational Games - http://www.irrationalgames.com/ (Tribes: Vengeance, System Shock II, Freedom Force, Thief, Ultima Underworld, etc...)
Arkane Studios - http://www.arkane-studios.com/en/index.php (Dark Messiah of Might & Magic, The Crossing, Arx Fatalis, etc...)
Troika Games - http://www.terra-arcanum.com/ (Vampire: Bloodlines, Temple of Elemental Evil, Arcanum, etc...)
Petroglyph - http://www.petroglyphgames.com/ (Universe At War: Earth Assault, Star Wars: Empire At War and expansions)
